title: Vino Volo Ale House
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, American, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Chain wine bar with food menu, located near the entrance to concourse D. Finding vegan meals in airports can be a challenge for traveling vegans; at this particular location, the menu includes one vegan patty (not listed on its website), and staff is accommodating. Uses locally grown produce where possible. Free Wi-Fi.
